mission.name: Treasure Hunter
mission.desc: Before her attack on Elaria, Aria travels to the Salt Wastes in search of an ancient power.

line.text: The glyphs spoke of an ancient power sealed away here. If I could just get my hands on it...
Don't you look at me like that. I told you it would be a long walk and you wanted to come.

mission.name: In Search of Power
mission.desc: Now that Aria has arrived in the Salt Wastes, she starts to travel towards their center like the glyphs described.

mission.name: The Salt Ways
mission.desc: The wasteland in this part of the world is harsh, and the creatures that live in it are desperate to survive.

mission.name: Hollow Ground
mission.desc: You come across a stretch of earth with no creatures in sight. Just as you begin to wonder why, a lonely lava crab scuttles out from some rocks and steals your skeleton companion's leg bone.

line.text: All the creatures avoid this area of the Salt Wastes. Maybe it is a key to the location of the power...
*scuttle* *scuttle*
GRAARRROOOoooooowww!
Hey! Give that fibula back! You can't just take bones off people, er... skeleton... things!

mission.name: Path to Knowledge
mission.desc: Chasing the lava crab took you down into a valley. You can see a monument in the distance.

mission.name: Monument in the Waste
mission.desc: The monument appears to be a landmark, directing travelers further south through the wasteland.

line.text: It's just a landmark, why would someone build this way out here?
Grraaaw?
I suppose you could be right...
Wait- was that you? I don't think we are alone.
Hsssssss!

mission.name: Corruption Eruption
mission.desc: As you defeat the wraits, the long shadows cast by the monument come to life, rising and attacking.

line.text: That was close, those wraiths almost overtook us. Nothing is a match for us though.
GRRAAWWW!
The shadows?! They are moving!

mission.name: Breaking Free
mission.desc: The ground shatters around your feet. Aria and her minion flee the valley but cannot outrun the Voidlings.

mission.name: Infestation
mission.desc: The entire Salt Wastes seems to quake as the Voidlings multiply. The creatures of the wastes seem to fall to their corrupt and begin to attack Aria.

mission.name: Aria's Flight
mission.desc: Aria breaks free of the Voidlings, running towards a nearby temple in search of sanctuary.

line.text: What are these things?! I've never seen anything like them!
Come with us! Hehehe!
No. Absolutely not.

mission.name: Sanctuary
mission.desc: Aria makes a break for the temple, trying to escape the Voidling's grasp. She is finding it harder to think clearly.

line.text: There! If we can just make it to that temple!

mission.name: Touch of the Void
mission.desc: Aria locks herself in the temple, finally finding safety from the Voidlings outside. However, it seems that the temple is not as safe as she believed.

line.text: Finally. We're. Safe. I haven't run like that in a long time.
... with us... Come... with us!

mission.name: Mind Seize
mission.desc: The Voidlings touch Aria's mind, filling her with confusion and visions of destruction. She summons as much Chaos magic as she can to fight them off.

line.text: No! Get out of my mind!
No. Absolutely not. Hehehe.

mission.name: Losing Control
mission.desc: The Voidlings grasp Aria's mind. The necromancer is having trouble holding onto her own consciousness.

mission.name: Shadows in Flight
mission.desc: With a scream Aria dashes further into the temple, leaving her skeleton familiar behind.

mission.name: Friendly Fire
mission.desc: Aria's skeleton familiar follows her deeper into the temple, looking to find the young woman. When he does, she lashes out at him.

line.text: ...Graaawwwr?
Who are you? Where am I?! STAY AWAY!

mission.name: Downfall
mission.desc: The Voidlings close in and for a brief moment Aria feels something beyond them, something larger. Then all she remembers is darkness.

mission.name: Aria's Shadow
mission.desc: Aria has been completely controlled. She strikes out against everything nearby, looking to destroy anything she can.

line.text: Come... with us.

mission.name: Lost Hatchlings
mission.desc: A dragon tamer has sent an emergency plea to all nearby adventurers. A series of quakes have sent the dragons of Tarragon Peak into a frenzy and many of the younger hatchlings are now missing and must be found!

line.text: Oh thank the fire lord, you've arrived!
Help us fight the frenzied dragons and help collect the lost hatchlings!

mission.name: Split Ground
mission.desc: A quake has definitely taken place here recently. The ground is split in numerous places and the dragons that live here have been stirred into a frenzy because of it.

mission.name: Dragon Cries
mission.desc: You hear the cries of dragon hatchlings in the distance. As you near them another out of control dragon flies overhead and swoops down on you.

mission.name: Ignition
mission.desc: A flash of fire draws you towards a small valley of lava. You peer around a pair of boulders to see Decim finishing an adult dragon off alone.

line.text: Who's there? You want to fight? Let's go!

mission.name: Parley
mission.desc: After you defeat Decim, he agrees to help you if you just don't harm him any further. You are not sure if you can trust him but you can use all the hands you can get.

line.text: Okay, OKAY! Stop, I will help you. You don't need to be so hot headed about it! So what are we looking for? Baby dragons?
It seems like there are plenty of full size dragons here to go around, maybe we should leave them?

mission.name: Down the Mountain
mission.desc: The quakes have brought the Orobas out of the mountains and into the valley. It rampages through the dragons, causing chaos where ever it goes.

line.text: Adventurer! Come this way! A beast has wandered down the mountain because of the quake and is attacking anything that comes near it!
RROOOOOAAAAAAARRRRRRRR!!!

mission.name: Decim, Chaos Incarnate
mission.desc: Upon hearing of rare breed of dragons trapped in Spellstones at the base of the mountain, Decim turns on you to try and take the power all for himself. Defeat his forces and find the Spellstone before he does!

line.text: It seems our time together is at an end. Those dragons will be mine! Allow me to eliminate the competition.

mission.name: Scorched Lands
mission.desc: The lands at the base of the mountain have taken years of punishment from dragon's fire. The rock that used to be at the base has been seared to Obsidian, perfect for incubating dragon eggs.

mission.name: Dragon's Aerie
mission.desc: Halfway up the mountain, the ground grows warm and the dragons more dense. This is the heart of the dragon's roost, and from here you can find the embers needed to heat the obsidian to hatch an egg.

mission.name: Ice Dragon's Realm
mission.desc: At the peak of the mountain lives the Ice Dragon, sitting on its roost and destroying anyone that comes near. Distract it long enough to grab one of the eggs it has stolen and bring it back down the mountain!

mission.name: Guardian's Light
mission.desc: As you arrive at the Celestial Vault, your airship is intercepted by a guardian in bright armor. They will not allow you to pass.

line.text: Hault! I will not allow you to awaken the Vault Ancient!

mission.name: Groc, Vault Ancient
mission.desc: As you defeat the guardian, you are confronted with a massive being of stone who rises from beneath the massive tree of the island.

line.text: It has been... many centuries. Who enters the Celestial Vault?

mission.name: Pincers in the Sky
mission.desc: The Celestial Vault is bursting with awakening elementals, their instincts rising to the threat of the Void far below in Arcantica.

line.text: The other elementals have awoken because of this Void you speak of. The world itself stands to fight this corruption.
Unfortunately, we must keep the elementals from destroying the Celestial Vault with their unleashed power.

mission.name: Make It Snappy
mission.desc: As the elementals continue to awaken, you must defeat the creatures that arise from the chaos.

mission.name: River of Gold
mission.desc: A massive elemental made of pure gold rises from the lava. Subdue it before it destroys the Celestial Vault and all the other elementals.

mission.name: Worth Its Weight
mission.desc: The gold elemental is weakened. Finish it off before it becomes stronger!

mission.name: Shakey Graves
mission.desc: The death of the gold elemental has left the island unstable! We need to start heading towards the east island.

mission.name: Mass Exodus
mission.desc: Creatures on the island are starting to panic, watch your back! We might be able to gain some ground through this cavern.

mission.name: A Promising Trail
mission.desc: Looks like the cavern will get us to the bridge in the east..but what is that smell?

mission.name: The Gatekeeper
mission.desc: We made it to the bridge! Gah, but of course this brute is blocking the way.

mission.name: Deepness
mission.desc: The sky was the last place you expected to find a lake. As you look into the water something stirs in the depths...

mission.name: Coral Madness
mission.desc: A monstrous elemental made of coral attacks you and your party. Defend yourself!

mission.name: Whirlwind
mission.desc: On the far side of the island is a small flat plataeu filled with wind elementals. As you near, they attack.

mission.name: Second Wind
mission.desc: The wind elementals continue to attack; Hold your ground and defend yourselves before they destroy the surrounding area.

mission.name: Call to Action
mission.desc: You've escaped the elementals at the Celestial Vault. However, they continue to cause chaos on Arcantica. Elyse may know a way to stop them.

line.text: Finally, the passage I was looking for!
A book about Dawnglow? You do realize the elementals are about to destroy Arcantica right? Why are you reading about the Frog Kingdom?
The Frog Emperor might be able to help us. This passage states they have a Guardian Stone that can help us calm the elementals.
Oh no no no...I'd sooner freeze to death than venture into those filthy swamp lands!

mission.name: Swamplands
mission.desc: Elyse has discovered an artifact that will calm the elementals. It lies at the heart of the Frog Kingdom in the western marshes.

line.text: I can't BELIEVE we are wading through this filth! How can you even be sure they still have this Guardian Stone?!
It's not like we have another choice. Besides, the stone has something to do with Frog mating rituals. I'm sure they keep it under heavy guard.
...I didn't think I could be any more disgusted.

mission.name: What Creeps in the Dark
mission.desc: You have made your way past the outskirts of the marshes and into the depths of the swamps. Careful how you proceed! You feel many eyes upon you.

mission.name: Treetop Horror
mission.desc: You hear rustling from the tree tops. Something seems to be following you through the swamps...

mission.name: Scent of Betrayal
mission.desc: As the creature scurries off into the treetops, you notice a strange scent around you...

line.text: GAH! What did that thing spray on us?! It smells horrid!
It smells of raw meat...
...I bet this is how that creature lures its prey.

mission.name: Through the Woods
mission.desc: The creatures of the swamp are on your trail. It's time to move quickly through the brush before they surround you!

mission.name: Room to Breathe
mission.desc: You've made it to a clearing in the swamp. You notice a makeshift sign that says 'Flytopia' ahead. But how do you get to Dawnglow from here?

line.text: You there! You are trespassing on Flytopia! Leave at once.
Err.. we are actually looking for Dawnglow. We need aid from the Emperor, the elementals have be-
Do you know the way to dry land?! WHERE IS IT!?!

mission.name: Tour Guide
mission.desc: You've encountered a Frog Scout on patrol. You may be able to persuade him into escorting you back to the Frog Kingdom.

line.text: Aria, relax! Listen sir, we just want to talk to the Emperor in Dawnglow. The elementals are out of control and he may be able to help.
You're here about the elementals? Why didn't you say so! The Emperor will want to see you right away.

mission.name: Paradise Lost
mission.desc: You've finally made it to the heart of the Frog Kingdom. The Emperor is concerned about the elementals' effect on his land. He is awaiting your arrival.

line.text: So these are the adventurers I've heard about. What do you know about the elemental problem?
There has been an outbreak of The Void at the Celestial Vault. Its causing the elementals to behave erratically.
Ahh, I see. The Void may be having effects on the swamp as well. The creatures have become more aggressive.

mission.name: An Old Fiend
mission.desc: The creature from the swampland has followed you back to the village. Stop it before it gets to the Emperor!

mission.name: Last Laugh
mission.desc: The Emperor's guard seems to be falling under a hypnotic effect from the creature. They are turning their swords on you!

mission.name: A Negotiation
mission.desc: The guards have regained their composure, but creatures still lurk around the Emperor's estate. Quickly state your business before any more interruptions occur.

line.text: The void is taking a heavy toll on the Kingdom. Do you know of a way to banish them?
I believe the Guardian Stone may be able to calm the rift.
This artifact is used to protect our unhatched young. What exactly do you plan to do with it?

mission.name: The Emperor's Deal
mission.desc: The Emperor seems hesitant of your intentions. You may be able to persuade him to let you examine the Guardian Stone.

line.text: I'll need to examine the relic to know how to use it against The Void, but I am certain it has properties that can help.
There are several of our unborn young throughout the swamp land. We need this artifact to ensure their safety.
The void is a growing threat for them as well, but I understand. If I bring the young back to the village may i examine the artifact?
Bring them here and we shall examine the Guardian Stone together.

mission.name: Back to the Swamps
mission.desc: The Emperor has asked that you recover the tadpoles before he lets you see the Guardian Stone. The first is located just south of the city.

mission.name: What Lurks
mission.desc: You found the cave where the first tadpole rests. Careful, creatures lurk outside the entrance...

mission.name: Guardian Awakened
mission.desc: The tadpole is in sight. It rests safely in a small pond within the cave. As you bundle it, you start to feel the ground shake...

line.text: So we are adding baby sitting to our list of expertise? This is a waste of time. We should have taken the stone by force.
Yes yes, and we'll take on the entire frog kingdom while we're at it. Here's the first tadpole, let's just gra-
The ground is shaking...?! Oh fire lord help us...

mission.name: Baby on Board
mission.desc: A guardian has arisen to protect the tadpole from intruders. However, you managed to escape the cave with the tadpole safely in tow. A second tadpole lies deep within the southern swamps.

line.text: Where did that thing come from? It was to big too have snuck up on us.
The Guardian stone must have summoned it to protect the tadpole. I did not know it was capable of such things...

mission.name: Over Easy
mission.desc: The smell of the tadpole is...pungent. Creatures of the swamp are starting to take notice as you venture.

mission.name: Motherly Instincts
mission.desc: The tadpole was knocked from your hands during the scuffle. Defeat the surrounding creatures before they reach it!

mission.name: Last Guardian
mission.desc: You've finally made your way to the lake, where the tadpole rests at its center.

line.text: Careful as you approach, another guardian may appear...

mission.name: Special Delivery
mission.desc: You have gathered tadpoles from the swamps. Time to return them to the Emperor so you may examine the Guardian Stone.

line.text: Thank you for bringing back our young. This is not all of them, but I fear we are running out of time. Here is the Guardian stone.
...I see. The stone emits an energy that is feeding into The Void... we will have to destroy the stone in order to calm the elementals.
You want to destroy the stone!?! It has been protecting our young for generations! Guards, take the stone!

mission.name: Tough Decisions
mission.desc: The Emperor refuses to destroy the Guardian Stone. However, the Elementals continue to cause chaos. You know it must be destroyed.

line.text: You have defeated my guard. I shall deal with you myself!

mission.name: Lost Hatchlings
mission.desc: A dragon tamer has sent an emergency plea to all nearby adventurers. A series of quakes have sent the dragons of Tarragon Peak into a frenzy and many of the younger hatchlings are now missing and must be found!

line.text: Oh thank the fire lord, you've arrived!
Help us fight the frenzied dragons and help collect the lost hatchlings!

mission.name: Split Ground
mission.desc: A quake has definitely taken place here recently. The ground is split in numerous places and the dragons that live here have been stirred into a frenzy because of it.

mission.name: Dragon Cries
mission.desc: You hear the cries of dragon hatchlings in the distance. As you near them another out of control dragon flies overhead and swoops down on you.

mission.name: Ignition
mission.desc: A flash of fire draws you towards a small valley of lava. You peer around a pair of boulders to see Decim finishing an adult dragon off alone.

line.text: Who's there? You want to fight? Let's go!

mission.name: Parley
mission.desc: After you defeat Decim, he agrees to help you if you just don't harm him any further. You are not sure if you can trust him but you can use all the hands you can get.

line.text: Okay, OKAY! Stop, I will help you. You don't need to be so hot headed about it! So what are we looking for? Baby dragons?
It seems like there are plenty of full size dragons here to go around, maybe we should leave them?

mission.name: Down the Mountain
mission.desc: The quakes have brought the Orobas out of the mountains and into the valley. It rampages through the dragons, causing chaos where ever it goes.

line.text: Adventurer! Come this way! A beast has wandered down the mountain because of the quake and is attacking anything that comes near it!
RROOOOOAAAAAAARRRRRRRR!!!

mission.name: Decim, Chaos Incarnate
mission.desc: Upon hearing of rare breed of dragons trapped in Spellstones at the base of the mountain, Decim turns on you to try and take the power all for himself. Defeat his forces and find the Spellstone before he does!

line.text: It seems our time together is at an end. Those dragons will be mine! Allow me to eliminate the competition.

mission.name: Scorched Lands
mission.desc: The lands at the base of the mountain have taken years of punishment from dragon's fire. The rock that used to be at the base has been seared to Obsidian, perfect for incubating dragon eggs.

mission.name: Dragon's Aerie
mission.desc: Halfway up the mountain, the ground grows warm and the dragons more dense. This is the heart of the dragon's roost, and from here you can find the embers needed to heat the obsidian to hatch an egg.

mission.name: Ice Dragon's Realm
mission.desc: At the peak of the mountain lives the Ice Dragon, sitting on its roost and destroying anyone that comes near. Distract it long enough to grab one of the eggs it has stolen and bring it back down the mountain!

mission.name: War of Lava
mission.desc: A final massive quake hits Tarragon Peak, opening up a rift in the lava lake at its base.

line.text: What was that? Another earthquake?!
ROOOAAARRRRRR!!!
Down below! A rift has opened in the lake and monsters are pouring out!

mission.name: Rising Fire
mission.desc: You've devised a plan to use a spell to close the rift. The problem is that you must get close to the rift for it to work. Fight your way through the hordes to its center!

mission.name: Heat of Battle
mission.desc: The battle at the lake of lava rages on. You try and get close enough to the rift to seal it shut, but there are just too many enemies. They threaten to overwhelm you!

mission.name: Melting Point
mission.desc: Breaking through a horde of enemies, you reach the rift. As you ready a spell to close the rift, a horde of skeletons climb out and begin to assault your position.

mission.name: Into the Tundra
mission.desc: Oda and Malchior have arrived in Frigore. It's rumored that the events that left Arcantica covered in ice occurred just past its outskirts. A strange magic has been left in the area...

line.text: Finally we have arrived in Frigore, one of the hardest hit area of Arcantica's ice age. There have been rumors lately of strange lights appearing in the area.
I wish you would have told me it was so cold here. I would have worn a few more layers...
Look! A flash of light on the horizon! So the rumors are true. Let's get a closer look.

mission.name: Bright Lights
mission.desc: Malchior spots strange flashes of light on the horizon. His eyes grow wide as he drags Oda to get a closer look.

mission.name: Shadows on the Horizon
mission.desc: The lights can be seen just past the cliff pass. However, there seems to be unknown figures stumbling away from the light.

mission.name: Dazed and Confused
mission.desc: They have made it under the strange flashes of light. You notice creatures nearby who appear to be dazed and confused.

mission.name: Big Flash, Big Beast
mission.desc: Another flash of light appears. With it, you notice a new horde of dazed creatures have materialized underneath it...

line.text: Interesting. It seems the creatures are appearing in correlation with the flashes of light.
There is something in the air around the light. Ugh, it is starting to get in my clothes.
I wonder if there is a connection...

mission.name: Eureka!
mission.desc: Eyes wider than ever, Malchior has quickly become fascinated with this mysterious light. He rummages through his notes as more creatures appear.

mission.name: Head Down and Fists Up
mission.desc: Oda desperately tries to warn Malchior of the surrounding dangers with no avail. More creatures creep closer.

mission.name: Mad Man's Dance
mission.desc: Malchior now holds an outstretched piece of fabric above his head. He runs under the lights as they appear. Oda looks horrified with his life decisions.

line.text: Why on earth are you running around with a sheet over your head? You look like a mad man.
I need to collect some of the vapor in the air for examination. I think it's related to the creatures appearing.
Hmm, this vapor seems to be made from the same substance as spellstones...

mission.name: Light Signals
mission.desc: Malchior spots a high cliff top and rushes to the top. He scans the horizon, observing the various flashes of light.

mission.name: Hot on the Trail
mission.desc: Malchior notices a nearby flash that is noticeably brighter than the others. He grins at Oda as he quickly grabs his gear.

line.text: Oh, look! The flashes of light to the east are much brighter than the others.

mission.name: Friends or Fiends
mission.desc: Oda squints at the surrounding hills as they travel. He sees faint footprints heading towards their destination. They don't look like they belong to any of the creatures he has seen so far. They look...human?

mission.name: Bigger and Brighter
mission.desc: Oda and Malchior hunker down in a ditch just outside of the bright light. The area looks foggy from the increased condensation of Arcane Vapor. As another flash of light passes, they notice even bigger creatures have been left in its wake.

mission.name: Mad Man Club
mission.desc: Oda notices other adventurers fighting creatures in the distance. One of them appears to be running around with an outstretched piece of fabric above his head. Looks like others are after the Arcane Vapor.

line.text: We are not the only ones out here. Looks like other adventurers are here collecting the Arcane Vapor.
They look like hunters. Hmm, this vapor might be capable of more than I suspected.

mission.name: Race for the Vapor
mission.desc: Adventurers continue to approach. They don't seem pleased that they have competition for collecting the arcane vapor.

mission.name: For Science!
mission.desc: You continue to travel towards the brighter flashes of light. Malchior is furiously taking notes, trying to figure out the differences between the lights.

line.text: I know you are excited about the vapor, but it seems the more we collect the bigger the creatures get.
Exactly! This vapor holds extraordinary power! Imagine what we will find once we collect more.

mission.name: Connecting the Dots
mission.desc: Oda peeks over Malchior's should to see he has drawn a series of graphs and doodles of large monsters. He sighs as more creatures approach.

mission.name: A Bold Request
mission.desc: Malchior seems fatigued from running around collecting the vapor. As he catches his breath, he sheepishly holds the fabric out to Oda.

mission.name: Good Sport
mission.desc: Oda reluctantly takes the fabric. Malchior holds in a chuckle as Oda runs in misery.

mission.name: Expected Results
mission.desc: Malchior examines the fabric after Oda is done. He is noticing differences in the amount of vapor they are collecting.

line.text: It seems the brighter the light, the more Arcane Vapor we are able to collect. Keep your eyes on the horizon Oda.

mission.name: Head Towards the Light
mission.desc: The surrounding sky darkens as another huge flash of light appears. You are not the only ones that will be heading towards it.

mission.name: The Mother Load
mission.desc: You've hit the mother load. The air is thick with arcane vapor.

line.text: This is extraordinary. The Arcane Vapor is incredibly dense here. According to my calculations we only need to collect a little more to spark the catalyst.
The catalyst... what exactly are you trying to spawn?
That's the exciting part. I have no idea!

mission.name: Enemy Territory
mission.desc: Oda and Malchior begin to collect the vapor, but they must be careful. Huge beasts and adventurers are roaming the area.

mission.name: Unwanted Attention
mission.desc: The other adventurers see how much vapor you're carrying. A worrying look appears on their faces.

mission.name: Storms Brewing
mission.desc: Malchior and Oda are collecting vapor faster than ever. The flashing lights increase in frequency as your stockpile grows.

mission.name: The Catalyst
mission.desc: After hours of gathering vapor, Malchior finally stops and grins. The ground begins to shake and the entire sky goes white...

line.text: The ground is shaking. Why is the ground shaking?!
We must have collected enough! We have reached the catalyst!!

mission.name: Void Voyage
mission.desc: Malchior and Tarian have made their way through the cold Frigore mountains. They are now nearing the center of The Void.

line.text: I believe we are getting closer to the Center of The Void. The concentration of Arcane Vapor has gotten a lot stronger since Frigore.
I sense a lot of undead in the area. We should be on our guard.

mission.name: Night Light
mission.desc: The area is starting to become dim and harder to navigate. Off in the distance, Tarian spots a strange purple glow.

mission.name: Purple Fire
mission.desc: Malchior giddily collects the purple fire in a bottle. Who knows what scientific wonders may be found with such an oddity. As he tightens the lid he notices a rustling behind him...

line.text: Astounding. I have been finding Purple Fire throughout the area. I have never seen anything like this. Let's keep an eye out for more.

mission.name: Vapor Source
mission.desc: Malchior meticulously reviews his observations from Frigore. He notices that the concentration of Arcane Vapor in the air increases as they continue towards the Center of The Void. Perhaps they are getting closer to the source of the Arcane Vapor?

mission.name: Happy Accident
mission.desc: Tarian stumbles to the ground after catching his boot on something. He looks to find a bone with unusual markings sticking out of the ground.

line.text: Ouch!
Gah, I tripped on this bone. Hmm, actually Malchior, you may want to take a look. It has some pretty unusual markings. I wonder what it cam-
HISSS!

mission.name: Light My Fire
mission.desc: Tarian spots Purple Fire further along the trail. Malchior frantically collects his things as they continue to investigate the strange phenomenon.

mission.name: Unwanted Company
mission.desc: Malchior notes how unusual it is that there are so many creatures in the area. It seems there are more and more of them as they continue down the path.

mission.name: Burn Marks
mission.desc: Tarian begins to notice unusual scorch marks in the area. They don't look like they came from any creature he has seen before...

mission.name: Nuts and Bolts
mission.desc: A body lies ahead of them on the trail. The surrounding area is filled with scorch marks. Malchior looks closer and finds glowing machine parts nearby.

line.text: Hmm, look at these scorch marks. These don't look like they came from a creature.
Bzzzzzzt

mission.name: Results Under Fire
mission.desc: Malchior is fascinated by the Arcane Turret. He has never seen this type of technology before. Perhaps combining the pieces with Purple Fire will yield something interesting?

mission.name: Void Emerging
mission.desc: They begin to see less snow on the path. It seems to end rather abruptly. Strange looking vegetation begins to surround them.

mission.name: Note Taking
mission.desc: Malchior is detailing the scenery change in his notebook. There is a definite pattern in the climate change that is highly unusual. He suspects they are getting closer to the cause of all this.

line.text: How strange. The snow has suddenly stopped and it's getting hotter as we continue.
I wonder if whatever caused this has anything to do with Arcantica's ice age...

mission.name: Being Watched
mission.desc: Tarian suddenly stops Malchior as they walk through the path. A faint hum can be heard above them. It's the same noise the turret they encountered before was making...

mission.name: Unseen Company
mission.desc: Malchior notes an already disassembled Turret next to the one they just defeated. It looks like it was recently active. They must not be the only ones in the area.

mission.name: Nerd Alert
mission.desc: Tarian spots tattered white clothing ahead of them. He sees it has a pocket protector on it. Perhaps it is not warriors they have to worry about.

mission.name: The Lost
mission.desc: A man in a white lab coat stands ahead of them. His body seems...unnatural. He appears to be mindlessly staring at a torch with Purple Fire in front of him. It may be unsafe if he notices you...

line.text: There is a man up ahead. He doesn't look like a warrior...but he looks badly injured. We may want to be cautio-
Sir! Are you alright?
Grahhh!

mission.name: But a Scratch
mission.desc: Malchior looks particularly disturbed as he stares at the scientist. His body seems to be infected by the void.

mission.name: Gravestone Manor
mission.desc: A clearing is ahead. Gravestones surround the area and a large decrepit building lies ahead. Familiar looking turrets are running along its borders.

line.text: Look! A building is up ahead. I can't believe there is anything out here. The building looks incredibly old.
And dangerous. There are turrets along its perimeter. Proceed carefully.

mission.name: Something in the Water
mission.desc: Malchior and Tarian approach the building. They spot more void infected scientists on the outskirts drinking from an unsavory looking pond.

mission.name: Finding Trouble
mission.desc: Malchior and Tarian stand in front of the abandoned building. The door is locked but may give way with a good push.

mission.name: Scanner Darkly
mission.desc: The building is dark. A familiar humming noise can be heard throughout the long corridor that lies in front of them.

mission.name: Revenge of the Nerds
mission.desc: All the noise seems to have stirred the remaining occupants of the building. Looks like this is where the scientists originated from.

mission.name: Candy Shop
mission.desc: You enter a room filled with lab equipment. Malchior's eyes begin to glimmer with the technology he's surrounded by. He barely stops to wonder what it's all for.

line.text: All this equipment! They have molecular configulators AND Spellstone dissectors! Can we take these back to the ship?!
…What's a molhecular configbulator?

mission.name: Dark Gardens
mission.desc: Malchior and Tarian make their way to the back of the laboratory. They open the last door to find a garden of black flowers with a woman in a lab coat at its center. She stops mumbling to herself and looks up as Malchior and Tarian enter.

line.text: More creatures spawned from The Void - more hideous than ever. It seems Arcantica will never recover from our failed experiments. Brethren, get rid of them!
Wait! We are not of The Void!
As I suspected...they must have been the ones to unleash The Void upon Arcantica.

mission.name: Clearing the Air
mission.desc: The woman seems delusional at best. Now that her companions have failed, she approaches Malchior and Tarian.

line.text: Don't lie to me! I saw The Void rip open with my very eyes! I know a demon when I see one. That one doesn't even have a face.

We wanted to manipulate spellstones to create creatures of unimaginable power. We were fools. I've created these flowers to try and rid the air of arcane vapor, so we may close The Void. I will not fail!

mission.name: Introspection
mission.desc: Samael sits quietly in the airship. Since the event at The Center of the Void he seems stuck in contemplation. There is a knock on his door...

line.text: You heard about the events at the Center of The Void?
Yes.
The Queen should know such technology exists. We need to inform her.
I know... but we might be putting our allies at risk.

mission.name: Between Friends
mission.desc: Samael seems hesitant about the journey to Skyhaven. He reluctantly agrees. Yuriel and and Samael depart from the airship and head to Skyhaven.

mission.name: Fire and Ice
mission.desc: They are a day's journey away from Skyhaven. As they climb higher into the atmosphere, they begin to find themselves in dragon territory...

mission.name: Snail Mail
mission.desc: A mail ship can be seen nearby. An unusual roaring sound seems to be coming from inside.

line.text: zZZzzzZZ...
Uhh.. sir? Are you ok? We heard som-
Waa! I wasn't asleep! Stay away from my mail!

mission.name: Lost Packages
mission.desc: The Mail Man seems startled. He begins frantically looking through his mail ship.

line.text: Oh, sorry about that. I thought you were those thugs trying to steal my mail.
Wait...not again! Where did that letter go?! And the packages!! Gah, some of the mail fell out of the back of the airship!
Please collect any letters and packages you find! If you collect enough to fill out the order, I can hook you up with some sweet rewards!

mission.name: Flight Delays
mission.desc: The air turns cold and thick as they make their way to Skyhaven. Samael's and Yuriel's wings begin to freeze over. They need to find the source of the cold, before it stops them from continuing their journey.

mission.name: Second Wind
mission.desc: The Ice Dragon barely escapes the fight. He disappears behind the clouds for a moment, before returning on a second wind!

mission.name: Beacon of Hope
mission.desc: The fog is heavy. Samael and Yuriel are starting to lose their way to Skyhaven, when they see glimmering in the distance.

mission.name: To the Queen
mission.desc: They reach the gates of Skyhaven and are warmly greeted on arrival. As Yuriel requests audience with the Queen of Skyhaven, Samael is swamped by the women of Skyhaven that have been missing him.

mission.name: Audience Granted
mission.desc: The Queen sits at her throne. A Lavatail dragon sleeps on her lap. She seems happy to see Samael and Yuriel as they enter her estate.

line.text: Samael and Yuriel, a pleasure to have you back in Skyhaven. Look, even Sparky missed you. Any updates on your reconnaissance missi-
Grraoof! Grraoof!
Sparky no! Down boy!

mission.name: To Business
mission.desc: The Queen restrains her pet and profusely apologizes. With a red face, she requests that they get to business before her pet has another outburst.

line.text: Malchior traveled to the Center of the Void. He found unusual technology that was used to create Spellstone creatures.
Astonishing. We have discovered an old, crashed airship in Skyhaven. Unusual technology has been found there. I wonder if it's related...
Can you two investigate the crash site and retrieve the technology? I will send our best engineer with you.
What exactly are you planning on doing with it?

mission.name: Dark Shadows
mission.desc: Samael and Yuriel head towards the airship. It is just on the east end of Skyhaven. As they make their way, a large shadow passes over them...

mission.name: Sleep Deprived
mission.desc: A gentle snoaring can be heard behind nearby shrubs. Yuriel sighs as he finds the same Mail Man, sleeping in his mail ship.

mission.name: Airship Ahead
mission.desc: The crashed airship is in sight. Samael and Yuriel approach with caution.

line.text: Look! That is the ship ahead!

mission.name: What Hides
mission.desc: They get closer to the crashed ship. It looks like it has been rummaged through since the crash. It's unclear by who or what...

mission.name: Signs from Home
mission.desc: Samael finds broken tools from Skyhaven in the wreck. There may be scavengers in the area. They will not appreciate competition for parts.

mission.name: A Familiar Face
mission.desc: A shadow flies over the wreck. The team looks up to find a familiar beast above them.

mission.name: A Lost Mind
mission.desc: The Queen's Engineer was bitten by the beast! He kneels to the floor, holding his wound.

line.text: Ahh! I was bit by that thing! Oh man...I don't feel well...

mission.name: Heading Home
mission.desc: The Engineer seems to have recovered from the poison. He has regained his mind and suggests they grab what they can and head back to the Castle immediately.

mission.name: Listening Ears
mission.desc: They leave the crash site, but the commotion of the fight seems to have drawn the attention of others.

mission.name: Strange Fiends
mission.desc: The team returns to the Kingdom. The Engineer has been examining the tech they found. He is eager to get to the Queen's court.

mission.name: Butterfingers
mission.desc: As they approach the court, Yuriel spots the Mail Man looking under a wagon. He seems to have lost something...

mission.name: Bad Boy
mission.desc: Samael, Yuriel, and the Engineer reach the doors of the Queen's court. They rush in, drawing the attention of one very excited dragon.

mission.name: Grave News
mission.desc: The Queen is eager to hear your report. She asks the Engineer what they found at the crash site.

line.text: We have brought back the technology. It certainly has unusual properties. It may be related to what was found at The Void.
Take it to the labs. We should learn more about it.
Destroy it! This technology is what opened The Void. I will not let you take it!

mission.name: Hard Decisions
mission.desc: Samael tries to grab the tech they brought back. The Queen immediately stands from her throne and alerts her guards.

line.text: Samael, stand down! We are only trying to understand the technology. Who knows what it is capable of!
No! No one should have this kind of power!

mission.name: Call For Help
mission.desc: The Airship has been flooded with mail from local villagers. Citizens have been complaining that Decim is setting their towns on fire!

line.text: Decim. I have gotten word from quite a few angry people that say someone of your description has been setting their homes on fire..?
Well they shouldn't have put all those houses in the open like that!
*Sigh* Alright..I think it's time you get some training on how to properly control your powers. Come with me.

mission.name: Training Day
mission.desc: Rayne and Decim arrive at the Celestial Vault. Rayne starts setting up targets around the islands so they may begin their training.

mission.name: Sharpshooter
mission.desc: Rayne has Decim stand 100 paces back from the targets. She keeps an eye on their surrounding as they will likely draw a lot of attention to themselves.

mission.name: Eagle Eye
mission.desc: Decim appears confident as he looks at the targets. Fire begins to surround his hands and a smile creeps onto his face.

mission.name: Beginner's Luck
mission.desc: Decim seems to be doing reasonably well with his training so far. Rayne is relieved that this task might not be as daunting as she thought.

mission.name: Love at First Sight
mission.desc: A Lava Crab wanders in front of the targets during training. Decim LOVES Lava Crabs! His hands are burning brighter than ever. He rushes towards the crab, wanting to play.

line.text: Hey this is actually pretty eas- OH MAN, is that a lava crab?! I LOVE LAVA CRABS!
Woah, Decim relax! You are starting to lose control of your abilities!

mission.name: Burning the Furnace
mission.desc: To Rayne's disbelief, the Lava Island is now overcome with fire. She is beginning to see why Decim is having trouble controlling his powers.

line.text: Since we have SOMEHOW managed to set the Lava Island on fire, we will have to continue our training here. I think I am starting to see the root of your problems...

mission.name: Apprentice and Master
mission.desc: Rayne takes Decim to the Water Island and sets up more targets. Decim still has an abundance of energy and is having trouble controlling his powers. Rayne makes notes as he tries to regain his composure.

mission.name: Burning Passion
mission.desc: Rayne notes that the strength of Decim's abilities are linked to how excited he is. Time for Decim to learn a thing or two about meditation.

line.text: Alright, Decim. We are going to go over some breathing exercises. Are you familiar with meditation?

mission.name: Practice Makes Perfect
mission.desc: Rayne asks Decim to still his thoughts and listen to the sounds of the waterfall. Deep breath in...and exhale.

mission.name: Controlled Burn
mission.desc: The flame around Decim's body calms as he takes a deep breath in. As they continue practice, it helps him regain control over his abilities.

mission.name: Meditation Master
mission.desc: Rayne is impressed by Decim's progress so far. Decim continues to show control over his abilities with each session of meditation.

line.text: Hey, this meditation stuff is actually helping!
Not bad so far. I think you are ready for a bigger challenge.

mission.name: Long Distance
mission.desc: Rayne thinks Decim is ready for a bigger challenge. She wants to test his abilities when they are being put under heavy strain. She tells him to shoot at the lavafall from the Water Island.

mission.name: Under Pressure
mission.desc: Decim needs to exert a lot more energy in order to lob his fireballs to the neighboring island. As he musters his strength, he struggles to control his powers...

mission.name: Keep Calm
mission.desc: 'Remember to breathe!' Rayne shouts. Decim's fire rapidly builds as he shoots fireballs towards the lavafall.

mission.name: Power Down
mission.desc: Decim employs the breathing techniques as he continues the barrage. The flame around his body becomes less wild and starts to concentrate around his hands.

mission.name: Angry Neighbors
mission.desc: Decim successfully completed the challenge safely! As Rayne gives him a congratulatory pat on the back, the lavafall begins bubble. It may have been a bad idea to be shooting all of those fireballs at it...

line.text: Oh gods, something is coming out of the lavafall. I think we did a bad thing...
But that thing is awesome! Its whole body is made of lava!

mission.name: Island Walker
mission.desc: Rayne looks proud at the progress Decim has made. She takes him to Earth Island to begin the final stage of his training.

line.text: Well, that elemental set the Water Island on fire...I guess we should move to Earth Island for the final test.

mission.name: Ring of Fire
mission.desc: Rayne creates a ring of targets. She and Decim stand in the middle. Rayne explains that she would like to test his abilities while he shoots the targets as fast as he can.

mission.name: Quick Draw
mission.desc: Decim takes a deep breath. He begins to shoot the targets as fast he can, although the strain of the exercise is making it difficult.

mission.name: Round Two
mission.desc: Rayne shows him one last technique. She tells him to keep a clear head and take short breaths between shots. Decim collects himself and gets ready for round two.

mission.name: Good Shot
mission.desc: Decim hits each target with excellent precision. He turns to Rayne with a big grin on his face.

line.text: Well Decim, I'm impressed. You have improved quite a bit during our training.
Maybe I can actually go back to one of the villages soon!
...Yeah... maybe we can start by visiting some of the villages in Karthos.

mission.name: Final Exam
mission.desc: Rayne is pleased with Decim. She feels they are ready to return to the airship. Although, perhaps not before one more test...

mission.name: Master or Apprentice
mission.desc: Rayne looks at Decim with a smirk. She announces she has one final test. He must beat her in both speed and accuracy while shooting the current targets!

mission.name: Downstairs Rumble
mission.desc: A close competition indeed. As Rayne claims her win, the ground begins to rumble. Looks like their competition has upset something on the island...

line.text: Oh boy...I think I might have set these targets on top of a earth elemental...
Grrrr

mission.name: Nice View
mission.desc: Cedric sits in his estate overlooking Golden Crown Village. He has spent many years protecting his home, but he knows the threat of The Void must be stopped. There is a knock on his door...

line.text: Ready to leave? I came to help you with the last of your things.
In a minute. Just want to enjoy the view for a bit. Golden Crown is quite stunning during the sunset.

mission.name: Moving Day
mission.desc: Ursurio grabs the last of Cedric's things. He carries it to the airship as Cedric is setting up his new room.

mission.name: A New Home
mission.desc: Cedric looks over Golden Crown one last time from his new room on the airship. It is time for him to say his goodbyes to the people of the village.

line.text: Looks like the last of your things have made it onto the airship.
I guess there wasn't much to begin with. I suppose that means it's time to say my goodbyes. I also need to see the Golden Crown leader for the final debriefing.

mission.name: Loyal Friends
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio make their way to the leader of Golden Crown for his final debriefing. Cedric tearfully says his goodbyes to the friends he sees along the way.

mission.name: Grand Entrance
mission.desc: They arrive at the leader of Golden Crown's court. She sits eagerly awaiting Cedric's arrival. A warm smile appears on her face when he enters.

line.text: Cedric, I have been waiting for you.
Just finished packing the rest of my things, ma'am. I am ready to fight The Void with our new friends here.
I wanted to say how much I appreciate this, Cedric. The Emperor would only send the best for a mission like this.

mission.name: Surprise Party
mission.desc: Cedric turns to leave Golden Crown. The Leader stops him with one last request for the empire's most loyal soldier...

line.text: Oh, before you go, Cedric, I have a surprise for you. I have put together a feast in honor of your departure!
A feast? I'm not sure I feel comfortable with such an extravaga...
Of course we will join you! What's on the menu?!

mission.name: Feast for a King
mission.desc: A feast awaits Cedric and Ursurio just outside the Court. Ursurio's eyes grow bigger than ever as he spots the giant bird they have prepared for the meal.

line.text: Oh my...that is the biggest bird I have ever seen...
It's glorious.

mission.name: Guest of Honor
mission.desc: Cedric sits at the spot prepared for him at the head of the table. Before the feast begins, many toasts are made in his honor.

mission.name: Dinner Party
mission.desc: The bird is cooked to perfection. It is devoured by the patrons of the event. To Ursurio's pleasure, there is enough food for him to take a third helping.

mission.name: The Biggest Fan
mission.desc: Drinks are being shared as the banquet comes to a close. The Golden Crown leader comes up to Cedric with her son, who is his biggest fan. The little scamp is beyond excited to finally meet his hero.

mission.name: Party Crashers
mission.desc: Large shadows appear over the banquet. Avian soldiers are overhead. They look in disgust at the bird feast that was just devoured.

line.text: What is that in the sky?! It's quickly coming this way!
Look out! Those are Avian Soldiers!!
No! They are going after my son! Quick, someone stop them!!

mission.name: A Son Lost
mission.desc: The Avian soldiers begin to fly away with the young boy. Ursurio and Cedric immediately come to the boy's aid before they get away!

mission.name: Catch Me If You Can
mission.desc: Cedric leaps for the boy's feet as the Avian soldiers continue with the escape. He is able to grab the boy's foot, but is not able to hold on for long.

mission.name: Shell Shock
mission.desc: The leader of Golden Crown is in shock. She can't believe her son has just been ripped away from her. She turns to Cedric with a desperate plea.

line.text: This is a tragedy. They took my son! Cedric, please! You must help me get him back!
Of course. I will do my best.

mission.name: Flanked
mission.desc: The Golden Crown leader sits in disbelief. She is at a loss as to why they would take her son.

line.text: This is a bold move for the Avians. I guess they did not like us feasting on the bird for dinner.
Our village has feasted on feral birds for years. It has never been a problem. The feral birds are not part of their society. I'm unsure why they have done this...

mission.name: On the Move
mission.desc: Cedric can barely see the Avian soldiers on the horizon. They will have to race as fast as they can to catch up to them.

mission.name: Resisting Arrest
mission.desc: Cedric can faintly see the boy struggling against his captors. He does not seem to be able to break free, but he is slowing them down. That might be just what they need to catch up to them.

mission.name: Shortcut
mission.desc: Cedric leads Ursurio through the treetops. He knows the quickest path to catch up with the Avian Soldiers.

mission.name: Closing the Gap
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio are closing the distance between them and the soldiers. With a few more shortcuts, they are sure to catch up with them soon.

line.text: The boy is struggling against the Avian Soldiers. It is slowing them down. We may be able to catch up to them if we keep up our pace.

mission.name: A Bold Move
mission.desc: The boy sees Cedric and Ursurio following the soldiers through the treetops. He realizes they will have trouble catching up with them. He knows he must become more bold in his attempts to escape.

mission.name: Spit in the Eye
mission.desc: The boy looks up at his avian captor. In a desperate attempt to escape, he shoots his tongue at the Avian's face and blinds him. Unable to see, the soldier crashes into a nearby tree.

mission.name: Bird Down
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio see the Avian soldier crash into the tree with the young boy. This may be the only chance to close the gap between them.

mission.name: Hostage Located
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio catch up to the Avians and the boy! They approach as the collapsed soldier struggles to regain his composure.

mission.name: Fight for Freedom
mission.desc: Cedric rushes for the boy while Ursurio approaches the soldiers. A rustling in the trees next to them catches him off guard...

line.text: Retreat while the enemy is distracted. Take the boy and go!
Not so fast! Let him go, or we'll be forced to fight.
Nice try, old frog. The boy stays with us until the Golden Crown Leader answers for her crimes. Soldiers, attack!
BAWKK!

mission.name: The Mad Bomber
mission.desc: A man has appeared juggling bombs. No one knows where he came from, but those bombs don't look happy. See if you can rescue them!

mission.name: The Sad Bomber
mission.desc: Man those bombs look depressed. We should pick up something for them at the store on our way over.

mission.name: The Glad Bomber
mission.desc: Did you see that? I think he smiled. He must have been lonely. I'm sure he has some tragic backstory and he really just wanted the power of friendship to save him. Or he just likes exploding things.

mission.name: The Rad Bomber
mission.desc: Man, I wish I was cool enough to hang out near an exploding volcano. Mad jealous.

mission.name: Chicken Assault
mission.desc: Reports of a figure assaulting civilians with chickens are pouring in. Someone should probably do something. Probably you.

mission.name: Chickens, Chickens Everywhere
mission.desc: OH MY GODS THEY ARE EVERYWHERE. WHY DO I GO ANYWHERE WITH YOU. NOTHING GOOD HAPPENS.

mission.name: Chicken Appreciation Day
mission.desc: Seriously, everytime we go on an adventure something goes wrong. Why do I hang out with you?

mission.name: Chicken Divebombs
mission.desc: Are those chickens FALLING FROM THE SKY?! Chickens can't even FLY! Someone needs to teach this artist about chicken physics.

mission.name: Doomsday
mission.desc: There's something in the lake. Probably not a good something. You should probably do something about it. Maybe. Do what you want I'm not a cop.

mission.name: Doomsday 2, Electric Boogaloo
mission.desc: Oh hey, you did it. Wait, no it's still here. Try again.

mission.name: The Day That Doomed
mission.desc: That thing really is made of something else. Keep trying? I'm not sure, I'll consult the manual while you do.

mission.name: Doomest Day
mission.desc: Ah. Killing it only makes it stronger. Until it doesn't get stronger. And then it dies. Right here in the manual. I guess keep hitting it until it doesn't get up. Don't look at me, I don't make the rules.

mission.name: Quick Stop
mission.desc: Ursurio sees some food unattended. He goes over to get a better whiff.

line.text: Ooo, this must be the sides for the feast! I'm sure no one will mind if I just take a litt-
Hey! What are you doing over there!

mission.name: Safe House
mission.desc: The Avian soldiers halt their escape. They have long since lost their pursuers and stop at a safe house for rest. The young frog sits nervously as the soldiers discuss their plans.

line.text: Aye boy, what's your name?
...Frobert.
Listen... I'm sorry you are stuck in the middle of this. Just know that we don't want to hurt you.

mission.name: Frenemy
mission.desc: The Avian leader looks at the boy with sympathy. He rummages through his pack and pulls out his rations. He splits his meal in half and offers it to the boy.

mission.name: Friend or Foe
mission.desc: Frobert nervously eats the food he is given. He looks at the Avian soldiers with fear and wonder. Golden Crown does not have many Avian visitors. This is the first time he has seen someone from the tribe up close.

mission.name: Short Leash
mission.desc: The Avian soldiers set up their cots for the night. The leader places Frobert's bed next to his. He asks the boy to hold out his wrist and handcuffs him to his cot. It's going to be a long night.

mission.name: Out at Dawn
mission.desc: The sun peeks over the horizon. The Avians gather their things and prepare for the journey back to the Avian city.

line.text: Sun is up, boys. Time to head to Red Feather. The Magistrate will be expecting us soon.

mission.name: On the Hunt
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio continue their chase through the Golden Crown forest. They have been on the chase for hours and show no sign of slowing down their efforts.

line.text: Cedric, we have been searching for hours. They have long been out of sight. Maybe we should stop and make camp.
We don't have time. I have no idea why they would kidnap Frobert. He might not be safe with them.

mission.name: Treetop Struggle
mission.desc: The hours of running through the treetops is slowing Ursurio down. He looks in amazement as Cedric continues his pace.

mission.name: Attention of the Wyld
mission.desc: As Cedric and Ursurio move through the forest of Golden Crown, they catch the eye of some of its Wyld inhabitants. The Avians aren't the only thing they have to worry about...

mission.name: Distant Gaze
mission.desc: Cedric is becoming visibly frustrated with all the setbacks they have encountered. Ursurio is beginning to suspect something deeper is upsetting him.

mission.name: Out of the Woods
mission.desc: The forest is coming to an end. Cedric and Ursurio are now in the lowlands of Arcantica. Cedric spots the valley where the Avian city lies: Red Feather Valley.

line.text: You're right to be concerned, Cedric. But I don't think they would kidnap him if they wanted to harm him. It looks like they are going after leverage.
It's like when someone steals your raisin cookie, but they don't even like raisins. They just want to trade it back to you for something they want.

mission.name: Don't Stress My Stride
mission.desc: Ursurio is grateful to be on terrain that is much easier for him to traverse. He is able to pick up his pace as they head toward Red Feather Valley.

mission.name: Water Break
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio come across a small stream in the lowlands. They briefly stop for a drink. Ursurio sees the worry building on Cedric's face.

mission.name: Preparing for Subterfuge
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio make it to the outskirts of Red Feather Vally. They take a moment to evaluate their approach. They know they will have to be careful to evade the City Guard.

line.text: I thought you didn't know Frobert? You seem attached to the boy.
He just reminds me of myself at that age...
Roooaaaarrrrr!!
A City Guardian this far out?!

mission.name: High Guard
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio defeat the mosterous City Guard without alering the city. The Avians' city lies in the heart of the valley, with outposts across the highland. Infiltrating will not be an easy task.

line.text: We need a way to sneak inside. It's not going to be easy with the all these patrol towers along the city.
Hmm, look over there. Looks like two of the guards are on their way to a patrol tower. Maybe we can borrow their uniforms?
I hope this plan won't involve trying to steal the lunch boxes they're carrying...

mission.name: A Favor from the Guard
mission.desc: Perhaps with some 'convincing' the guards will let Cedric and Ursurio borrow their uniforms. And maybe some lunch too.

mission.name: Though the Brush
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio slowly approach the guards. They sneak along the other side of the vegetation, ready to pounce.

line.text: Quiet, Ursurio! They are going to hear us if you keep stomping around like that.
Do I look like I am made for stealth?
We don't want to alert any-
What was that?!

mission.name: Tight Fit
mission.desc: The uniforms are snug at best. The cloaks hide their form, but anyone who is paying close enough attention will see through their disguise. They will have to navigate the city carefully if they do not want to alert the guard.

mission.name: Swagger
mission.desc: They approach the front entrance to Red Feather. With a confident walk, they stroll right in without much attention from another one of those monstrous City Guards the avians employ.

mission.name: Out of Sight, Out of Mind
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio make it into the city! They quickly head towards the side streets to keep out of sight.

line.text: I can't believe we made it into the city with these uniforms!
Count our blessings as they come ol' boy. Now, let's get to the capital.

mission.name: Capital Offense
mission.desc: They see the capital, which towers over the rest of the city. If Frobert is anywhere, it's there.

mission.name: Somber City
mission.desc: They maneuver their way toward the capital. They notice the civilians on the street don't pay much attention to them. The mood of the city seems unusually somber...

mission.name: High Stakes
mission.desc: Cedric and Ursurio make their way to the outside of the capital without incident. However, getting inside will not be as easy. Cedric looks for ways inside the capital.

line.text: Look, there is a back entrance to the capital. Hmm, looks like it's guarded though.
It's our best shot. The front is swarming with guards.

mission.name: You Snooze You Lose
mission.desc: Cedric spots a back entrance to the Capital. Two guards stand at its entrance, although it looks relatively unused. The guards have dozed off. They might just be able to sneak by them...

mission.name: Magistrate Quarters
mission.desc: They make their way inside the capital. Cedric is familiar with the layout. He suspects they are keeping Frobert in the Avian Magistrate's quarters. Luckily, they are not far from it.

line.text: Shh, I think I hear Frobert... he is in the Magistrate's Quarters.
Oh gods, he's crying!
He's probably just hungry...

mission.name: For Frobert!
mission.desc: They make their way to the door of the Magistrate quarters. Cedric presses his ear to the door, hearing the quiet whispers of young Frobert. Without hesitation, Cedric bursts through the door.

line.text: Frobert! Are you ok?!
Cedric... you are here quicker than I expected. It's okay, we have not hurt the boy.
Why have you taken him?!
Golden Crown has made grave transgressions against us. Your mayor... she has been hunting our patrolmen...
